item.description:
You must register at www.biotechtuesday.com to be added to the guest list unless you already on the Biotech Tuesday mailing list. Otherwise there will be a $20 fee at the door.

 

Enjoy a night of networking with your biotech colleagues at the next BiotechTuesday. This month we will meet at 6B Lounge, a nice venue that is well situated in the Park Street area. The event will follow the usual BiotechTuesday format with a check-in table.

DATE: Tuesday, September 20th, 2011
TIME: 7-10PM
LOCATION: 6B Lounge
6 Beacon Street
Boston, MA
617-742-0306

In order to help people with scheduling, the anticipated dates for the next two BiotechTuesday events are as follows:
October 18, 2011
November 15, 2011

-------------------------------------
The bar is closest to the Park Street stop on the Red Line. There is very limited street parking, but there are public garages in the area.
item.name: Biotech Tuesday
